GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v4.14.235
GSD.description:
mld: fix panic in mld_newpack()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.235 by commit 221142038f36d9f28b64e83e954774da4d4ccd17, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit 72e09ad107e78d69ff4d3b97a69f0aad2b77280f. For more details please see the references link.
